text: The Proclamation of Singapore is part of an agreement about the separation of Singapore from Malaysia as an independent and sovereign country dated on 7 August 1965 between the Governments of Malaysia and Singapore, and an act to change the Constitution of Malaysia and the Malaysia Act on 9 August 1965 signed by the leaders of both countries. ==References== Category:20th century in Singapore Category:20th century in Malaysia Category:1965 in Asia
title: Proclamation of Singapore
